info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:49AM EST until February 22 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of northern Vermont and northern New York. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Today, ice accretion will be primarily in the higher terrain of the northern Adirondacks and northern Greens. Areas of freezing drizzle will expand into the St. Lawrence and northern Champlain Valleys by this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
